# WorldQuest
WorldQuest RPG

## Features

* 2 Maps
* Stairs
* Woodcutting
* Firemaking
* Melee Combat
* Armour
* Weapons
* Digging
* Mining
* Experience
* 2 Enemy Types
* Shop that sells items

## Roadmap

Goals for version 0.1

* Messages
* Conversations
* Selling items

Goals for version 1.0

* Auto-generated, persistant dungeons
* Auto-generated, persistant surface landscape
* Quests
* Smithing
* Crafting
* Ranged weapons
* Magecraft
* Prospecting
* Mining Ores
* Smelting
